definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: At least hold accountant certificate specialize in accounting or budget.
sentences.chinese: 拥有会计师或预算师资格。

sentences.english: In the United States, the certification examinations are prepared and administrated by the American institute of Certified Public Accountants (AICPA).
sentences.chinese: 在美国，这种考试由美国注册会计师协会负责和实施。

sentences.english: The company recognized Mr Brown's outstanding work by promoting him to chief accountant.
sentences.chinese: 公司提升布朗先生为总会计师以表彰他出色的工作。

sentences.english: The chief accountant of a manufacturing group.
sentences.chinese: 一个制造业集团的总会计师。

sentences.english: It makes pretty good money. The hours are ok.
sentences.chinese: 会计师可以赚蛮多钱，工作时间也还好。

sentences.english: The root cause of the loss of CPAs sincerity lies in the deficiency of system proper.
sentences.chinese: 注册会计师诚信缺失的根源在于制度缺陷。

sentences.english: My uncle, an accountant, composes music as an avocation.
sentences.chinese: 我叔叔是一位会计师，作曲是他的业余爱好。

sentences.english: Qiu Renqing, specialized accountant, presently is responsible for QIANYIl tellers work.
sentences.chinese: 邱仁庆，专业会计师，现负责千艺出纳工作。

sentences.english: Dr. Marvin Cheung is a professional accountant.
sentences.chinese: 张建东博士是专业会计师。

sentences.english: And nobody ought to be singing louder than the teams' accountants.
sentences.chinese: 并且，应该没有人的歌声会响过球队的会计师。

sentences.english: The drunken little costdrawer and his brother, the cornet player.
sentences.chinese: 酗酒的小成本会计师和他那吹短号的兄弟。

sentences.english: With the deepening of reform in hospitals, it is especially necessary for hospitals to adopt the system of controllership.
sentences.chinese: 医院深化改革，实施医院总会计师制度尤为必要。

sentences.english: Our domain experts are parents, not bankers or accountants.
sentences.chinese: 我们领域的专家是父母或会计师们。

sentences.english: He worked as a chief accountant, and he worked really long hours.
sentences.chinese: 他是做总会计师的，每天工作很长时间。

sentences.english: Sit down with your accountant or bookkeeper to prioritize your payables.
sentences.chinese: 和您的会计师坐下来商谈您的应付账款。

sentences.english: At least two yeas of experience as an accountant in an international organization is a must.
sentences.chinese: 必须有在国际机构组织中至少两年的会计师工作经验。

definition: to file an income tax return/to declare dutiable goods (at customs)
to work in a profession (e.g. doctor, lawyer)/practitioner/professional
